#summary Starting with nginx

= Installing from the source =
{{{
sudo apt-get remove nginx # Removes all but config files.

sudo apt-get purge nginx # Removes everything.

sudo apt-get autoremove # After using any of the above commands, use this in order to remove dependencies used by nginx which are no longer required.
}}}
http://blog.thehippo.de/2012/12/server/install-nginx-from-source-on-ubuntu/

adding the postgresql module:

https://github.com/FRiCKLE/ngx_postgres/

{{{

git clone https://github.com/FRiCKLE/ngx_postgres.git

./configure --add-module=/home/demo/nginx/modules/ngx_postgres
}}}

{{{
cd ~/nginx/nginx-1.4.7
./configure --prefix=/opt/nginx --user=nginx --group=nginx --with-http_ssl_module --add-module=/home/demo/nginx/modules/ngx_postgres

./configure --with-http_ssl_module --add-module=/home/demo/nginx/modules/ngx_postgres
}}}
